Explanation.name: first person left side mix
Explanation.description: for first person sounds to the left of you

Explanation.name: first person middle mix
Explanation.description: for first person sounds between your ears

Explanation.name: first person right side mix
Explanation.description: for first person sounds to the right of you

Real.name: scary target threhold
Real.description: A target of this scariness is officially considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)

Real.name: scary weapon threhold
Real.description: A weapon of this scariness is officially considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)

RealFraction.name: magnetism friction
RealFraction.description: how much the crosshair slows over enemies

RealFraction.name: magnetism adhesion
RealFraction.description: how much the crosshair sticks to enemies

RealFraction.name: inconsequential target scale
RealFraction.description: scales magnetism level for inconsequential targets like infection forms

Real.name: seconds to start
Real.description: how long you must be pegged before you start sprinting

Real.name: seconds to full speed
Real.description: how long you must sprint before you reach top speed

Real.name: decay rate
Real.description: how fast being unpegged decays the timer (seconds per second)

Real.name: full speed multiplier
Real.description: how much faster we actually go when at full sprint

Real.name: pegged magnitude
Real.description: how far the stick needs to be pressed before being considered pegged

Real.name: pegged angular threshold
Real.description: how far off straight up (in degrees) we consider pegged

RealFraction.name: look peg threshold [0,1]
RealFraction.description: magnitude of yaw for pegged acceleration to kick in

Real.name: look yaw acceleration time
Real.description: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

Real.name: look yaw acceleration scale
Real.description: maximum effect of a pegged look (scales last value in the look function below)

Real.name: look pitch acceleration time
Real.description: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

Real.name: look pitch acceleration scale
Real.description: maximum effect of a pegged look (scales last value in the look function below)

Real.name: look autolevelling scale
Real.description: 1 is fast, 0 is none, >1 will probably be really fast

ShortInteger.name: minimum autolevelling ticks
ShortInteger.description: amount of time player needs to move and not look up or down for autolevelling to kick in

Angle.name: minimum angle for vehicle flipping
Angle.description: 0 means the vehicle's up vector is along the ground, 90 means the up vector is pointing straight up:degrees

Real.name: minimum action hold time
Real.description: time that player needs to press ACTION to register as a HOLD

Explanation.name: health

Real.description: enemy rate of fire scale on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard rate of fire
Real.description: enemy rate of fire scale on hard difficulty

Real.description: enemy rate of fire scale on impossible difficulty

Real.description: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on easy difficulty

Real.description: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on normal difficulty

Real.description: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. projectile error
Real.description: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on impossible difficulty

Real.description: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on easy difficulty

Real.description: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on normal difficulty

Real.description: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on hard difficulty

Real.description: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on impossible difficulty

Real.name: easy new target delay
Real.description: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on easy difficulty

Real.description: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on normal difficulty

Real.description: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on hard difficulty

Real.description: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on impossible difficulty

Real.description: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

Real.description: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. burst separation
Real.description: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

Real.name: easy target tracking
Real.description: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on easy difficulty

Real.description: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard target tracking
Real.description: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on hard difficulty

Real.description: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on impossible difficulty

Real.description: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on easy difficulty

Real.name: hard target leading
Real.description: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on hard difficulty

Real.name: easy overcharge chance
Real.description: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

Real.name: normal overcharge chance
Real.description: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard overcharge chance
Real.description: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. overcharge chance
Real.description: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

Real.name: easy special fire delay
Real.description: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

Real.name: normal special fire delay
Real.description: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard special fire delay
Real.description: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. special fire delay
Real.description: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

Real.name: easy guidance vs player
Real.description: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on easy difficulty

Real.name: normal guidance vs player
Real.description: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard guidance vs player
Real.description: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. guidance vs player
Real.description: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on impossible difficulty

Real.name: easy melee delay base
Real.description: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on easy difficulty

Real.name: normal melee delay base
Real.description: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard melee delay base
Real.description: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. melee delay base
Real.description: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on impossible difficulty

Real.description: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on easy difficulty

Real.description: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on normal difficulty

Real.description: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on hard difficulty

Explanation.name: grenades
Explanation.description: difficulty-affecting values for enemy grenade behavior

Real.name: easy grenade chance scale
Real.description: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on easy difficulty

Real.name: normal grenade chance scale
Real.description: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard grenade chance scale
Real.description: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. grenade chance scale
Real.description: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on impossible difficulty

Real.name: easy grenade timer scale
Real.description: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on easy difficulty

Real.name: normal grenade timer scale
Real.description: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard grenade timer scale
Real.description: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. grenade timer scale
Real.description: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on impossible difficulty

Real.name: easy major upgrade (normal)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on easy difficulty

Real.name: normal major upgrade (normal)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard major upgrade (normal)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. major upgrade (normal)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on impossible difficulty

Real.name: easy major upgrade (few)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on easy difficulty

Real.name: normal major upgrade (few)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard major upgrade (few)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. major upgrade (few)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on impossible difficulty

Real.name: easy major upgrade (many)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on easy difficulty

Real.name: normal major upgrade (many)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard major upgrade (many)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. major upgrade (many)
Real.description: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on impossible difficulty

Real.name: easy player vehicle ram chance
Real.description: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on easy difficulty

Real.name: normal player vehicle ram chance
Real.description: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on normal difficulty

Real.name: hard player vehicle ram chance
Real.description: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on hard difficulty

Real.name: imposs. player vehicle ram chance
Real.description: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on impossible difficulty

Explanation.name: function textures
Explanation.description: Used internally by the rasterizer. (Do not change unless you know what you're doing!)

Explanation.name: default textures
Explanation.description: Used internally by the rasterizer - additive, multiplicative, detail, vector. (Do not change ever, period.)

Explanation.name: experimental textures
Explanation.description: Used internally by the rasterizer. (Used by Bernie's experimental shaders.)

Explanation.name: global shader
Explanation.description: Used for layers that need to do something for other layers to work correctly if the layer is disabled, also used for active-camo, etc.

Explanation.name: PC textures
Explanation.description: The PC can't use 3D textures, so we use this instead.

Real.name: stun movement penalty
Real.description: 1.0 prevents moving while stunned

Real.name: stun turning penalty
Real.description: 1.0 prevents turning while stunned

Real.name: stun jumping penalty
Real.description: 1.0 prevents jumping while stunned

Real.name: minimum stun time
Real.description: all stunning damage will last for at least this long

Real.name: maximum stun time
Real.description: no stunning damage will last for longer than this

Explanation.name: vehicle terrain parameters
Explanation.description: the following fields modify the way a vehicle drives over terrain of this material type.

Real.name: ground friction scale
Real.description: fraction of original velocity parallel to the ground after one tick

Real.name: ground friction normal k1 scale
Real.description: cosine of angle at which friction falls off

Real.name: ground friction normal k0 scale
Real.description: cosine of angle at which friction is zero

Real.name: ground depth scale
Real.description: depth a point mass rests in the ground

Real.name: ground damp fraction scale
Real.description: fraction of original velocity perpendicular to the ground after one tick

Explanation.name: sweetener inheritance flags
Explanation.description: when a sweetener inheritance flag is set the sound\effect is not inherited from the parent material. If you leave the sweetener blank and set the flag than no effect\sound will play
